remarks: Orthogonality (meaning inner product is 0) is commutative. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)

phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.

ip0l.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` F ) $.
iporthcom $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( A ., B ) = Z <-> ( B ., A ) = Z ) ) $.
